title: Marvel Comics Celebrates the Launch of 'MARVEL Cosmic Invasion' with New Variant Covers - Marvel
description: Starting in January, new comic book variant covers will feature character artwork from 'MARVEL Cosmic Invasion,' the upcoming game from Dotemu and Tribute Games, made in collaboration with Marvel Games.
